name: Charcoal_Grey_Bonded_Leather_Reclining_Sofa
description: Upholstered in charcoal grey bonded leather with padded head and arm rests, lumbar support and reclining mechanism, this will be the perfect addition to any space. The tufted detailing and sleek track arms give this set a chic modern look that is sure to enhance your living space. Ideal for movie night, reading a book or just to kick back and relax after a long day’s work, this modular motion series was designed for ultimate comfort. StyleCasual, Contemporary, TransitionalMaterialBonded Leather, Foam, WoodTypeRecliner, SofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolid
